titlebar.layout: relative top-0 left-0 w-full h-fit flex items-center justify-between p-1 rounded-t-lg shadow-md

window.snap-overlay: fixed pointer-events-none z-[9999] border-2 border-window-snap-preview-fg bg-window-snap-preview-bg transition-all duration-150 shadow-2xl
window.base: absolute flex flex-col border-[1px] shadow-2xl backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl
window.titlebar: relative flex items-center justify-between p-1 w-full shrink-0 select-none cursor-default overflow-hidden bg-windows-titlebar-bg text-windows-titlebar-fg shadow-lg rounded-t-lg
window.menu_base: text-dim flex gap-1 text-6 font-200 relative z-[1] bg-windows-titlebar-bg rounded-md
window.title: absolute left-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-fit max-w-full text-center whitespace-nowrap flex items-center justify-center
window.content: relative flex grow w-full bg-windows-content-bg text-windows-content-fg rounded-b-lg shadow-inner overflow-hidden

textfield.variant_default: border h-6 text-textfield-fg bg-textfield-bg focus:shadow-md transition-shadow

button.base: flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap focus-visible:outline-none disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-sm transition-all duration-150

combobox.input: bg-transparent border-none px-1 w-full h-full outline-none focus:outline-none rounded-md

dialog.backdrop: fixed inset-0 bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-sm flex items-center justify-center z-50
dialog.variant_default: bg-windows-content-bg text-windows-content-fg p-4 border border-line w-fit max-w-128 h-fit shadow-2xl

select.layout: absolute z-50 overflow-auto bg-select-bg shadow-2xl ring-1 ring-line focus:outline-none rounded-lg border border-line/50
select.item: flex w-full cursor-pointer select-none items-center justify-between gap-2 px-1.5 py-1 text-select-item-fg bg-select-item-bg focus:bg-select-item-active-bg focus:text-select-item-active-fg [&_icon]:text-4 first:rounded-t-lg last:rounded-b-lg transition-colors

file_browser.content: w-full h-full flex flex-col bg-file-browser-bg overflow-y-auto select-none rounded-b-xl
file_browser.entry: w-full text-left flex items-center px-1 hover:bg-file-browser-entry-hover whitespace-nowrap hover:bg-hover rounded-md mx-1 transition-colors
file_browser.entry_icon: font-200 shrink-0 w-6 h-6 text-6 mr-1 not-italic

settings.heading: font-bold text-ui-lg capitalize
settings.label: text-ui capitalize
settings.fieldset: w-full p-2 border border-line rounded-md flex flex-col gap-1
